CodeList.Name: The Functional Assessment of Cancer Therapy-Prostate Version 4 Questionnaire Test Code

Description.TranslatedText: The Functional Assessment of Cancer Therapy-Prostate Version 4 test code.

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCSynonym: FAC023-I Have a Lack of Energy
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Functional Assessment of Cancer Therapy-Prostate Version 4 - Physical Well-Being: I have a lack of energy.
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: FACT-P Version 4 - I Have a Lack of Energy

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Functional Assessment of Cancer Therapy-Prostate Version 4 - Physical Well-Being: I have nausea.
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: FACT-P Version 4 - I Have Nausea

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Functional Assessment of Cancer Therapy-Prostate Version 4 - Physical Well-Being: Because of my physical condition, I have trouble meeting the needs of my family.
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: FACT-P Version 4 - Trouble Meeting Needs of Family

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Functional Assessment of Cancer Therapy-Prostate Version 4 - Physical Well-Being: I have pain.
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: FACT-P Version 4 - I Have Pain

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Functional Assessment of Cancer Therapy-Prostate Version 4 - Physical Well-Being: I am bothered by side effects of treatment.
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: FACT-P Version 4 - Bothered by Treatment Side Effect

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Functional Assessment of Cancer Therapy-Prostate Version 4 - Physical Well-Being: I feel ill.
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: FACT-P Version 4 - I Feel Ill

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCSynonym: FAC023-I Am Forced to Spend Time in Bed
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Functional Assessment of Cancer Therapy-Prostate Version 4 - Physical Well-Being: I am forced to spend time in bed.
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: FACT-P Version 4 - I Am Forced to Spend Time in Bed

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCSynonym: FAC023-I Feel Close to My Friends
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Functional Assessment of Cancer Therapy-Prostate Version 4 - Social/Family Well-Being: I feel close to my friends.
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: FACT-P Version 4 - I Feel Close to My Friends

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Functional Assessment of Cancer Therapy-Prostate Version 4 - Social/Family Well-Being: I get emotional support from my family.
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: FACT-P Version 4 - Get Emotional Support From Family

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCSynonym: FAC023-I Get Support From My Friends
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Functional Assessment of Cancer Therapy-Prostate Version 4 - Social/Family Well-Being: I get support from my friends.
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: FACT-P Version 4 - I Get Support From My Friends

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCSynonym: FAC023-My Family Has Accepted My Illness
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Functional Assessment of Cancer Therapy-Prostate Version 4 - Social/Family Well-Being: My family has accepted my illness.
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: FACT-P Version 4 - My Family Has Accepted My Illness

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Functional Assessment of Cancer Therapy-Prostate Version 4 - Social/Family Well-Being: I am satisfied with family communication about my illness.
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: FACT-P Version 4 - Satisfied With Family Communication

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCSynonym: FAC023-I Feel Close to My Partner
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Functional Assessment of Cancer Therapy-Prostate Version 4 - Social/Family Well-Being: I feel close to my partner (or the person who is my main support).
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: FACT-P Version 4 - I Feel Close to My Partner

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCSynonym: FAC023-I Am Satisfied With My Sex Life
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Functional Assessment of Cancer Therapy-Prostate Version 4 - Social/Family Well-Being: I am satisfied with my sex life.
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: FACT-P Version 4 - I Am Satisfied With My Sex Life

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Functional Assessment of Cancer Therapy-Prostate Version 4 - Emotional Well-Being: I feel sad.
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: FACT-P Version 4 - I Feel Sad

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCSynonym: FAC023-Satisfied With How I Am Coping
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Functional Assessment of Cancer Therapy-Prostate Version 4 - Emotional Well-Being: I am satisfied with how I am coping with my illness.
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: FACT-P Version 4 - Satisfied With How I Am Coping

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Functional Assessment of Cancer Therapy-Prostate Version 4 - Emotional Well-Being: I am losing hope in the fight against my illness.
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: FACT-P Version 4 - Losing Hope Against Illness

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Functional Assessment of Cancer Therapy-Prostate Version 4 - Emotional Well-Being: I feel nervous.
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: FACT-P Version 4 - I Feel Nervous

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Functional Assessment of Cancer Therapy-Prostate Version 4 - Emotional Well-Being: I worry about dying.
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: FACT-P Version 4 - I Worry About Dying

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCSynonym: FAC023-Worry My Condition Will Get Worse
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Functional Assessment of Cancer Therapy-Prostate Version 4 - Emotional Well-Being: I worry that my condition will get worse.
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: FACT-P Version 4 - Worry My Condition Will Get Worse

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Functional Assessment of Cancer Therapy-Prostate Version 4 - Functional Well-Being: I am able to work (include work at home).
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: FACT-P Version 4 - I Am Able to Work

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Functional Assessment of Cancer Therapy-Prostate Version 4 - Functional Well-Being: My work (include work at home) is fulfilling.
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: FACT-P Version 4 - My Work Is Fulfilling

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCSynonym: FAC023-I Am Able to Enjoy Life
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Functional Assessment of Cancer Therapy-Prostate Version 4 - Functional Well-Being: I am able to enjoy life.
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: FACT-P Version 4 - I Am Able to Enjoy Life

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Functional Assessment of Cancer Therapy-Prostate Version 4 - Functional Well-Being: I have accepted my illness.
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: FACT-P Version 4 - I Have Accepted My Illness

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Functional Assessment of Cancer Therapy-Prostate Version 4 - Functional Well-Being: I am sleeping well.
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: FACT-P Version 4 - I Am Sleeping Well

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCSynonym: FAC023-Enjoy Things I Usually Do for Fun
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Functional Assessment of Cancer Therapy-Prostate Version 4 - Functional Well-Being: I am enjoying the things I usually do for fun.
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: FACT-P Version 4 - Enjoy Things I Usually Do for Fun

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCSynonym: FAC023-Content With Quality of My Life
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Functional Assessment of Cancer Therapy-Prostate Version 4 - Functional Well-Being: I am content with the quality of my life right now.
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: FACT-P Version 4 - Content With Quality of My Life

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Functional Assessment of Cancer Therapy-Prostate Version 4 - Additional Concerns: I am losing weight.
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: FACT-P Version 4 - I Am Losing Weight

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Functional Assessment of Cancer Therapy-Prostate Version 4 - Additional Concerns: I have a good appetite.
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: FACT-P Version 4 - I Have a Good Appetite

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Functional Assessment of Cancer Therapy-Prostate Version 4 - Additional Concerns: I have aches and pains that bother me.
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: FACT-P Version 4 - Have Aches and Pains That Bother Me

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCSynonym: FAC023-Certain Parts of Body Have Pain
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Functional Assessment of Cancer Therapy-Prostate Version 4 - Additional Concerns: I have certain parts of my body where I experience pain.
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: FACT-P Version 4 - Certain Parts of Body Experience Pain

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCSynonym: FAC023-Pain Keeps Me From Doing Things
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Functional Assessment of Cancer Therapy-Prostate Version 4 - Additional Concerns: My pain keeps me from doing things I want to do.
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: FACT-P Version 4 - Pain Keeps Me From Doing Things

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Functional Assessment of Cancer Therapy-Prostate Version 4 - Additional Concerns: I am satisfied with my present comfort level.
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: FACT-P Version 4 - Satisfied With Comfort Level

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCSynonym: FAC023-I Am Able to Feel Like a Man
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Functional Assessment of Cancer Therapy-Prostate Version 4 - Additional Concerns: I am able to feel like a man.
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: FACT-P Version 4 - I Am Able to Feel Like a Man

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCSynonym: FAC023-I Have Trouble Moving My Bowels
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Functional Assessment of Cancer Therapy-Prostate Version 4 - Additional Concerns: I have trouble moving my bowels.
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: FACT-P Version 4 - I Have Trouble Moving My Bowels

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Functional Assessment of Cancer Therapy-Prostate Version 4 - Additional Concerns: I have difficulty urinating.
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: FACT-P Version 4 - I Have Difficulty Urinating

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Functional Assessment of Cancer Therapy-Prostate Version 4 - Additional Concerns: I urinate more frequently than usual.
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: FACT-P Version 4 - I Urinate More Frequently

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Functional Assessment of Cancer Therapy-Prostate Version 4 - Additional Concerns: My problems with urinating limit my activities.
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: FACT-P Version 4 - Problem Urinating Limits Activity

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Functional Assessment of Cancer Therapy-Prostate Version 4 - Additional Concerns: I am able to have and maintain an erection.
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: FACT-P Version 4 - Able to Have and Maintain an Erection

CodeList.nciodm:CDISCSynonym: The Functional Assessment of Cancer Therapy-Prostate Version 4 Questionnaire Test Code
CodeList.nciodm:PreferredTerm: CDISC Questionnaire FACT-P Version 4 Test Code Terminology
